algorithm.title: Einflusspunkt
algorithm.abstract: Lines feel attracted to dots. From analogue to digital to print.

iss.title: ISS info
iss.abstract: A simple infographic with some interesting facts about the International Space Station.

algorithm.title: LineLights
algorithm.abstract: One line, unlimited ways to connect neighbour points and create a pattern.

iss.title: LookUp
iss.abstract: The ISS is actually visible with naked eyes from the earth. But do we know when and where is the right spot of sighting.

algorithm.title: Fade Away
algorithm.abstract: An analog algorithm converted digital realized with P5js

iss.title: Here Comes the Sun
iss.abstract: A data visualization that compares the hours of sun and Lux-values between the Earth and the ISS.

TRANSL8R.title: TRANSL8R
TRANSL8R.abstract: Machines playing the Chinese whispers game in four different languages

algorithm.title: What Goes Around Comes Around
algorithm.abstract: Use your Mouse and explore the algorithm.

iss.title: Spacejunk
iss.abstract: Three infovis posters about spacejunk in earth orbit. They were created with basil.js. Each junk pieces is represented by a circle and its name is written inside the circle.

algorithm.title: From Letter to Picture
algorithm.abstract: In this project I am trying to translate the different layout types of letters to artificial coded pictures. I created this project in 2015 as part part of the course 'Steel Ant - Input/Output' at the University of Applied Science in Potsdam (Germany). We dealed with the topic generative design and became acquainted with P5.js supported by Fabian Mor√≥n Zirfas 'fabiantheblind' and also influenced by Mey Lean Kronemann.

iss.title: Research Matters
iss.abstract: In this project I am showing how many different research projects have been executed on the ISS and which countries are involved.

algorithm.title: Mitte Zur Mitte
algorithm.abstract: a line goes from one side to another, and chose a different part every time

iss.title: ISS Money
iss.abstract: an data visualisation of the ISS expenses

algorithm.title: Lifelines
algorithm.abstract: Analog, Digital or Real? Lifelines is a series of various experiments with analog and digital algorithms and their adaption to an application.

iss.title: Encounters in Space
iss.abstract: Space shuttles regualarly fly to the ISS (International Space Station) to exchange team-members of the nasa's expeditions. This continous fluctuation of people results that some of them only met in space. Encounters In Space is a collection of graphics which highlighting the fact that a small amount of human beeings met eachother in cosmic space...

algorithm.title: Time Deconstruction
algorithm.abstract: Exploration of a new way to display time.

iss.title: Relativity and the ISS
iss.abstract: Visualization of how the effects of relativity affect the crew members in the ISS.

algorithm.title: Outlines
algorithm.abstract: My goal was to create repetitive patterns,I liked that the patterns could tell something about a person by showing me some part of the world they are surrounded by, as if seen in a distorted mirror.

iss.title: ISS:Numbered Parts
iss.abstract: A poster where you can learn about the current parts of the ISS ad about their history, with the visual inspirations of retro-futurism, as in 2001: A Space Odyssey and Barbarella.

algorithm.title: Pendots
algorithm.abstract: Pen Dots is an algorythm created through a process based on several experiments executed by humans and transcripted in p5js forming individual pens.

iss.title: Hisstory
iss.abstract: hISStory is the visualisation of the history of the International Space Station.

algorithm.title: Molecular Networks: Uniques Generated Patterns
algorithm.abstract: The molecular networks algorithm is a javascript written algorithm that generates a unique molecular-like pattern using the library p5js.

iss.title: Explore with the International Space Station
iss.abstract: The ISS travels fast around the globe, visiting numerous countries more often than you will never be able to. Follow the ISS and learn about the countries it flies over.

exercise.title: A visual representation (data visualization) of the chimical elements periodic table
exercise.abstract: How to represent something that has been represented a thousend times already? This periodic table of the chemical element is the result of an exercise intended to introduce students to the field of data visualization. I recieved a list of all chemical elements as a json dataset and the visualization is what I've done with it.

algorithm.title: Flags Raising from Zero
algorithm.abstract: Diffrent flags can have the same visual language. With this little program you can create flags having a unique style.

iss.title: ISS as Far Away
iss.abstract: A visual interpretation of the individual distance between each ISS crew member and the belonging place of home

algorithm.title: Bounce Algorithm
algorithm.abstract: Bounce Algorithm is an algorithm written in JavaScript which creates a pattern by letting lines bounce off a canvas.

iss.title: I See Streams
iss.abstract: I See Streams tries to capture the current position of the International Spacestation in combination with tweets being written right under it.
